name: Vicious Stomp
text: You take advantage of the moment to brutally kick an enemy when he is down.
benefit: Whenever an opponent falls prone adjacent to you, that opponent provokes an attack of opportunity from you. This attack must be an unarmed strike.
staminaText: When an opponent provokes an unarmed strike attack of opportunity from you by falling prone, you can spend 2 stamina points to deal an additional 1d6 points of damage with that unarmed strike.
text_zh: 你在对手倒地的恰当时机猛踹之。
prerequisites_zh: 战斗反射，精通徒手打击。
benefit_zh: 当对手倒在你的邻接方格，他将会触发你的借机攻击。借机攻击必须以徒手攻击。
staminaText_zh: 当一个对手因为摔倒引发了你的徒手击打借机攻击，你可以消耗2点耐力来在那次徒手击打上造成额外的1d6点伤害。
